titolo_articolo: Favro Named a Cool Vendor by Gartner
testo:
Favro, a leader in enterprise agile tools, has been named in the “Cool 
      Vendors in Application Development” published on 5 November 2018 by 
      Gartner, Inc., the world’s leading research and advisory company.
    
    

      According to Gartner analysts Keith Mann, Mike West, Nathan Wilson, 
      “Cool Vendors in Application Development, 2018, are going far beyond 
      coding and testing tools to address the application development 
      challenges facing today’s application leaders. They are helping 
      self-organizing teams realize their potential and gain a better 
      understanding of how to provide value to customers.”
    
    

      “With Favro we set out to support autonomous teams in any discipline 
      being more agile and organizations to be more aligned. To us, being 
      named as a Gartner Cool Vendor is a great accomplishment for the Favro 
      team distributed across Uppsala, Stockholm, and Da Nang,” says Patric 
      Palm, Favro CEO and co-founder.
    
    

      For those who would like to know more about why Favro is named a Cool 
      Vendor, a complimentary copy of the full report can be requested at [https://www.favro.com/gartner-cool-vendor].
    
    

      
Disclaimer:
    

    

      
Gartner does not endorse any vendor, product or service depicted in 
      our research publications and does not advise technology users to select 
      only those vendors with the highest ratings or other designation. 
      Gartner research publications consist of the opinions of Gartner's 
      research organization and should not be construed as statements of fact. 
      Gartner disclaims all warranties, expressed or implied, with respect to 
      this research, including any warranties of merchantability or fitness 
      for a particular purpose.
    

    

      
About Favro
    

    

      
Favro enables individuals and teams from the world's most progressive 
      companies to operate with agility, autonomy and alignment. Favro 
      provides a single workspace for seamless collaboration, communication 
      and creation. Our objective is to become the first choice collaboration 
      product for makers and managers, entrepreneurs and enterprises.
